name: react_express_boilderplate
description: Optimized ES6+ React-Express boilderplate and login/signup flow

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run mongodb" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.update: ncu -u && npm i && cd client && npm i && ncu -u && cd ../server && npm i && ncu -u

author: Naaman Hirschfeld
